Fatih Birol bụ onye Turkey na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na ọkachamara na ike, onye jere ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke International Energy Agency (IEA) kemgbe 1 Septemba 2015

N'oge ọ na-elekọta IEA, o meela usoro iji melite nzukọ mba ụwa nke dị na Paris, gụnyere iwusi mmekọrịta ya na akụ na ụba na mba ndị na'ịpụta n'ọhịa dị ka India na China ike na ịrụ ọrụ na mgbanwe ike dị ọcha na mbọ mba niile iji nweta ikuku efu.

Birol nọ na ndepụta Time 100 nke ndị kachasị emetụta n'ụwa na 2021, magazin Forbes akpọwo ya aha n"etiti ndị kacha emenye mmetụta nʼihe gbasara ike n "ụwa" ma Financial Times kwetara na ya na 2017 dị ka Onye Ike nke Afọ. Birol bụ onye isi oche nke World Economic Forum (Davos) Energy Advisory Board
Ọ bụ onye na-enye onyinye ugboro ugboro na mgbasa ozi na kọmputa ma na'inye ọtụtụ okwu kwa afọ na nnukwu nzukọ na nzukọ mba ụwa.
Tupu ịbanye na IEA dị ka onye nyocha nke obere na 1995, Birol rụrụ ọrụ na Organisation of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) na Vienna
N'ime ọtụtụ afọ na IEA, Birol rụrụ ọrụ ruo n'ọrụ nke Chief Economist, ọrụ nke ọ na-ahụ maka akụkọ IEA nke World Energy Outlook na-elele anya, tupu ọ ghọọ onye isi nchịkwa na 2015.
Nwa amaala Turkey, a mụrụ Birol na Ankara na 1958
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta BSc na injinịa ike na mahadum Istanbul Technical University
O nwetara MSc na PhD na Economic Economics site na Technical University of Vienna
N'afọ 2013, e nyere Birol nzere Doctorate of Science honoris causa site na Imperial College London
Emere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndụ nsọpụrụ nke klọb bọọlụ Galatasaray S.K
